verses.verse: Now<WG1161> in<WG1722> the fifteenth<WG4003> year<WG2094> of the reign<WG2231> of Tiberius<WG5086> Caesar,<WG2541> Pontius<WG4194> Pilate<WG4091> being governor<WG2230> of Judea,<WG2449> and<WG2532> Herod<WG2264> being tetrarch<WG5075> of Galilee,<WG1056> and<WG1161> his<WG846> brother<WG80> Philip<WG5376> tetrarch<WG5075> of the region<WG5561> of Ituraea<WG2484> and<WG2532> Trachonitis,<WG5139> and<WG2532> Lysanias<WG3078> tetrarch<WG5075> of Abilene,<WG9>

in<WG1909> the high priesthood<WG749> of Annas<WG452> and<WG2532> Caiaphas,<WG2533> the word<WG4487> of God<WG2316> came<WG1096> to<WG1909> John,<WG2491> the son<WG5207> of Zacharias,<WG2197> in<WG1722> the wilderness.<WG2048>
He<WG2532> came<WG2064> into<WG1519> all<WG3956> the region around<WG4066> the Jordan,<WG2446> preaching<WG2784> the baptism<WG908> of repentance<WG3341> for<WG1519> remission<WG859> of sins.<WG266>

As<WG5613> it is written<WG1125> in<WG1722> the book<WG976> of the words<WG3056> of Isaiah<WG2268> the prophet,<WG4396> <WG3004> "The voice<WG5456> of one crying<WG994> in<WG1722> the wilderness,<WG2048> <WG4160> 'Make ready the way<WG3598> of the Lord.<WG2962> Make<WG4160> his<WG846> paths<WG5147> straight.<WG2117>

Every<WG3956> valley<WG5327> will be filled.<WG4137> <WG2532> Every<WG3956> mountain<WG3735> and<WG2532> hill<WG1015> will be brought low.<WG5013> <WG2532> The crooked<WG4646> will become<WG2071> straight,<WG2117> and<WG2532> the rough<WG5138> ways<WG3598> <WG1519> smooth.<WG3006>
All<WG3956> flesh<WG4561> will see<WG3700> God<WG2316>'s salvation.<WG4992>'"

He<WG3004> said therefore<WG3767> to the multitudes<WG3793> who went out<WG1607> to be baptized<WG907> by<WG5259> him,<WG846> "You offspring<WG1081> of vipers,<WG2191> who<WG5101> warned<WG5263> you<WG5213> to flee<WG5343> from<WG575> the wrath<WG3709> to come?<WG3195>

Bring forth<WG4160> therefore<WG3767> fruits<WG2590> worthy<WG514> of repentance,<WG3341> and<WG2532> don't<WG3361> begin<WG756> to<WG3962> say<WG3004> among yourselves,<WG1438> <WG2192> 'We have Abraham<WG11> for<WG1063> our father;<WG3962>' for<WG1063> I tell<WG3004> you<WG5213> that<WG3754> God<WG2316> is able<WG1410> to raise up<WG1453> children<WG5043> to Abraham<WG11> from<WG1537> these<WG5130> stones!<WG3037>

Even<WG1161> now<WG2235> the axe<WG513> also<WG2532> lies<WG2749> at<WG4314> the root<WG4491> of the trees.<WG1186> Every<WG3956> tree<WG1186> therefore<WG3767> that doesn't<WG3361> bring<WG4160> forth<WG4160> good<WG2570> fruit<WG2590> is cut down,<WG1581> and<WG2532> thrown<WG906> into<WG1519> the fire.<WG4442>"
The<WG2532> multitudes<WG3793> asked<WG1905> him,<WG846> "What<WG5101> then<WG3767> must we do?<WG4160>"

He answered<WG611> them,<WG846> "He who has<WG2192> two<WG1417> coats,<WG5509> let him give<WG3330> to him who has<WG2192> none.<WG3361> He<WG2532> who has<WG2192> food,<WG1033> let him do<WG4160> likewise.<WG3668>"
Tax collectors<WG5057> also<WG2532> came<WG2064> to be baptized,<WG907> and<WG2532> they said<WG2036> to<WG4314> him,<WG846> "Teacher,<WG1320> what<WG5101> must we do?<WG4160>"
He<WG1161> said<WG2036> to<WG4314> them,<WG846> "Collect<WG4238> no<WG3367> more<WG4119> than<WG3844> that which is appointed<WG1299> to you.<WG5213>"

Soldiers<WG4754> also<WG2532> asked<WG1905> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> "What about us?<WG5101> What must<WG4160> we<WG2249> do?<WG4160>" He<WG2532> said<WG2036> to<WG4314> them,<WG846> "Extort from<WG1286> no one<WG3367> by violence,<WG3366> neither accuse<WG4811> anyone wrongfully.<WG4811> Be content<WG714> with<WG3800> your<WG5216> wages.<WG3800>"

As<WG1161> the people<WG2992> were in<WG1722> expectation,<WG4328> and<WG1161> all men<WG3956> reasoned<WG1260> in<WG1722> their<WG846> hearts<WG2588> concerning<WG4012> John,<WG2491> whether<WG3379> perhaps he<WG846> was<WG5547> the Christ,<WG5547>

<WG2491> answered<WG611> them<WG537> all,<WG537> "I<WG1473> indeed<WG3303> baptize<WG907> you<WG5209> with water,<WG5204> but<WG1161> he comes<WG2064> who is<WG3450> mightier than<WG2478> I,<WG846> the latchet<WG2438> of whose<WG3739> sandals<WG5266> I<WG846> am<WG1510> not<WG3756> worthy<WG2425> to loosen.<WG3089> He<WG846> will baptize<WG907> you<WG5209> in the<WG4151> Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> and<WG2532> fire,<WG4442>

whose<WG3739> fan<WG4425> is in<WG1722> his<WG846> hand,<WG5495> and<WG2532> he will thoroughly cleanse<WG1245> his<WG846> threshing floor,<WG257> and<WG2532> will gather<WG4863> the wheat<WG4621> into<WG1519> his<WG846> barn;<WG596> but<WG1161> he will burn<WG2618> up the chaff<WG892> with unquenchable<WG762> fire.<WG4442>"
Then<WG2532> with many<WG4183> other exhortations<WG3870> he<WG2097> preached good news<WG2087> to the people,<WG2992>

but<WG1161> Herod<WG2264> the tetrarch,<WG5076> being reproved<WG1651> by<WG5259> him<WG846> for<WG4012> Herodias,<WG2266> his<WG846> brother<WG80>'s <WG5376> wife,<WG1135> and<WG2532> for<WG4012> all<WG3956> the evil<WG4190> things which<WG3739> Herod<WG2264> had done,<WG4160>
added<WG4369> this<WG5124> also<WG2532> to<WG1909> them all,<WG3956> that<WG2532> he shut up<WG2623> John<WG2491> in<WG1722> prison.<WG5438>

Now<WG1161> it happened,<WG1096> when<WG1722> all<WG537> the people<WG2992> were baptized,<WG907> Jesus<WG2424> also<WG2532> had been baptized,<WG907> and<WG2532> was praying.<WG4336> The sky<WG3772> was opened,<WG455>

and<WG2532> the<WG4151> Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> descended<WG2597> in a bodily<WG4984> form<WG1491> as<WG5616> a dove<WG4058> on<WG1909> him;<WG846> and<WG2532> a voice<WG5456> came<WG1096> out<WG1537> of the sky,<WG3772> saying<WG3004> "You<WG4771> are<WG1488> my<WG3450> beloved<WG27> Son.<WG5207> In<WG1722> you<WG4671> I am well pleased.<WG2106>"

Jesus<WG2424> himself,<WG846> when he began<WG756> to teach,<WG5616> was about thirty<WG5144> years<WG2094> old,<WG2094> being<WG5607> the son<WG5207> (as<WG5613> was<WG2242> supposed<WG3543>) of Joseph,<WG2501> the son of Heli,<WG2242>
the son of Matthat,<WG3158> the son of Levi,<WG3017> the son of Melchi,<WG3197> the son of Jannai,<WG2388> the son of Joseph,<WG2501>
the son of Mattathias,<WG3161> the son of Amos,<WG301> the son of Nahum,<WG3486> the son of Esli,<WG2069> the son of Naggai,<WG3477>

the son of Melchi,<WG3197> the son of Addi,<WG78> the son of Cosam,<WG2973> the son of Elmodam,<WG1678> the son of Er,<WG2262>

the son of Methuselah,<WG3103> the son of Enoch,<WG1802> the son of Jared,<WG2391> the son of Mahalaleel,<WG3121> the son of Cainan,<WG2536>
the son of Enos,<WG1800> the son of Seth,<WG4589> the son of Adam,<WG76> the son of God.<WG2316>
